original_text: So the young men who had been to look at the city went to her house. They brought out Rahab and her whole family. That was her father and her mother, and her brothers and all who belonged to her. They took them to a place that was near the Israelite tents.
korean_text: 정탐한 젊은이들이 들어가서 라합과 그의 부모와 그의 형제와 그에게 속한 모든 것을 이끌어 내고 또 그의 친족도 다 이끌어 내어 그들을 이스라엘의 진영 밖에 두고

sentences.original_text: So the young men who had been to look at the city

sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그녀의 온 가족도 데리고 나왔습니다.

sentences.original_text: That was her father and her mother,
and all who belonged to her.
They took them to a place
that was near the Israelite tents.
sentences.korean_translation: 그곳은 이스라엘 사람들의帐篷 가까운 곳이었습니다.
